Name: G端l
description:
G端l is a 39-year-old married mother of 1 child and a primary school graduate. She has been trying to make a living by working in gardens and fields since she was very young. With the idea of doing something different, she turned her field into a lavender garden 3 years ago and has been trying to earn money. G端l also tries to make a living by making soap and cologne from the lavender she grows.

G端l wants to increase her income by buying lavender seeds with the support she will receive through Kiva.
